specific - relation - general.cyper_for_intermediate_page: MATCH (snp_node:sequence_variant:snp)-[r:fine_mapped_eQTL_of]->(gene_node:gene) WHERE snp_node.id = '@sequence_variant@' RETURN snp_node, r, gene_node
specific - relation - general.cyper_for_result_page_all_nodes_specific: ?MATCH (g:gene {id:@gene_node@})-[r]-(neighbor) RETURN g.id AS GeneID, type(r) AS RelationshipType, collect(neighbor.id) AS NeighborIDs
next_questions: Which {function ontologies@ontology} are linked to {gene identifier@n1:gene}?

general - relationship - specific.open_cyper: MATCH (n1:sequence_variant)-[r:eQTL_of]->(n2:gene) WHERE n2.id = '@gene' RETURN n1, r, n2
extend_cyper: })-[r]-(neighbor) RETURN g.id AS GeneID, type(r) AS RelationshipType, collect(neighbor.id) AS NeighborIDs
next_questions: Which {function ontologies@ontology} are linked to {gene identifier@n1:gene}?
visualizations: Gene Association and Regulation Browser - Gene
